ygData.msgSnippet: Sunhawk descended on the Predicons right on top of Drillbit. Sunhawk:  Kup, Grimlocke I m not sure where, but there s a flier with 2 laser wounds and a grenade

Sunhawk descended on the Predicons right on top of Drillbit.

Sunhawk:  Kup, Grimlocke I'm not sure where, but there's a flier with 
2 laser wounds and a grenade wound somewhere around here.  Find him 
and bring him back and look around for any others.  I'll take this 
one back, and Condor I think there's another Pred at the top of this 
crater in stasis.  Get him.  Oh and Kup when you've sent Grimlocke 
back towards the base wtih the flier get the energon and try to be 
more careful than these Preds were.

He flew off with Drillbit towards the base sinking his claws in JUST 
deep enough to make sure Drillbit would be in pain when he awoke.
